```{r}
prices <- read_csv("/storage/icaif/done_data.csv") %>%
  arrange(datadate, tic) %>%
  select(-X1) %>%
  filter(tic == "AAPL") %>%
  mutate(price = adjcp) %>%
  nest("features" = adjcp:turbulence) %>%
  mutate(n_step = 1:n()) %>%
  glimpse

usethis::use_data(prices)
```
